rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time. As long as you control another permanent named Lakebed Wrudge, you may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.
{T}: Mill a card.
Reflect {3} [i]({3}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Fish without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
